content: Everybody's always talkin' at me, everybody's tryin' to get in my head. I wanna listen to my own heart talkin', I need to count on myself instead. Did you ever lose yourself to get what you want? Did you ever get on a ride then wanna get off? Did you ever push away the ones you shoulda held close? Did you ever let go, did you ever not know? I'm not gonna stop, that's who I am. I'll give it all I got, that is my plan. Will I find what I lost? You know you can. Bet on it, bet on it.
author: Zac Efron
